requirement: The notification of the game ending will include the reason the game is ended (i.e., a player has won the game or a player has ended the game).
The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.'
The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC  the system will be available 99\% of the time during the first six months of operation.'
The product shall operate in offline mode whenever internet connection is unavailable.'
A database management system such as Oracle  DB2  MySql or HSQL will need to be integrated with the product.'
If the shot was marked as a hit, the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.
For each turn, the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.
The product shall continue to assign turns until the game is ended.
The product is expected to run on Windows CE and Palm operating systems.'
The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.'
The product shall comply with corporate User Interface Guidelines'
system shall be able to handle all of the user requests/usage during business hours.'

requirement: The system shall maintain user sessions indefinitely until manual logout.
